Event.Message: The system time has changed to %1 from %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NewTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="OldTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> </template>

Event.Message: License policy-cache corruption has been fixed.
License policy-cache has expired because it was not updated within expected duration.
{Registry Hive Recovered} Registry hive (file): '%3' was corrupted and it has been recovered. Some data might have been lost.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FinalStatus" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ExtraStringLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ExtraString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="ExtraStringLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: An I/O operation initiated by the Registry failed unrecoverably.The Registry could not flush hive (file): '%3'.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FinalStatus" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ExtraStringLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ExtraString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="ExtraStringLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: TxR init phase for hive %2 (TM: %3, RM: %4) finished with result=%5 (Internal code=%6).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraStringLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ExtraString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="ExtraStringLength"/> <data name="TmId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="RmId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="InternalCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: The operating system started at system time %7.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MajorVersion" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MinorVersion" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="BuildVersion" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="QfeVersion" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ServiceVersion" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="BootMode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StartTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> </template>

Event.Message: The operating system is shutting down at system time %1.
